group.Description: Healthy controls or patients with trigeminal neuralgia

sex.Description: Sex of the participant as reported by the participant

Clinical_finding.Description: Neurological or other general somatic symptoms/diseases

MRI_finding.Description: Notable features of MRI images of the participants

Sindou_grade.Description: Grades of neurovascular conflict according to M.Sindou classification system

Levels.1: slight contact of the nerve with the offending vessel
Levels.2: distortion or displacement of the nerve
Levels.NA: Not applicable or no neurovascular conflict detected

Pain_side.Description: Side of the facial pain in patients

Pain_type.Description: Type of the facial pain in patients

Pain_severity.Description: Average pain severity score reported by patient

Disease_duration.Description: Duration of the trigeminal neuralgia history in patients

Pharm_treatment.Description: Drugs taken by patients and daily dose (mg)

Surgery_type.Description: Type of the surgery that patient underwent for trigeminal neuralgia treatment

Levels.Outpatient: Patients who did not undergo surgical treatment

Surgery_outcome.Description: Outcome of the surgical treatment based on intraoperative findings

Postsurgery_pain_reduction.Description: Percentage of pain reduction after surgical treatment

Previous_surgeries.Description: This variable indicates whether the patient earlier underwent any surgery for trigeminal neuralgia

Levels.yes: There was at least one surgery done for the treatment of patient's facial pain
Levels.no: No surgeries were done before current hospital admission

Previous_surgery_type.Description: Types of previous surgeries for trigeminal neuralgia

Surgical_complications.Description: Complications that occurred after surgical treatment

First_follow-up.Description: Variable that specifies if the given participant has first follow-up data collected after surgical treatment

Levels.yes: Patient has the first follow-up data

First_follow-up_time.Description: Time from surgery to first follow-up assessment

Second_follow-up.Description: Variable that specifies if the given participant has second follow-up data collected via telephone interview

Levels.yes: Patient has the second follow-up data

Second_follow-up_pain.Description: Pain severity at second follow-up assessment

Second_follow-up_time.Description: Time from surgery to second follow-up assessment

Racial_ethnic_category.Description: Racial or ethnic category of participant

Comorbid_conditions.Description: Comorbid medical conditions reported by participant
